author: andschwa
body: OS X's ping command requires the flags to be specified before the arguments. I also reduced the ping count so that the tests execute a bit faster. This resolves #556.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: No one but @vors and I can really test this as we're the only ones (that I know of) that have Apple hardware right now. Take my word for it, this fixed the test on OS X, so all Pester tests now pass. Merging!

title: Fix Start-Process tests
